title: Off-road Champion Justin Peck
description:
Justin Peck is an off-road racer, public speaker, and mental health advocate. He talks to us about racing, crashing, one-armed fist fights, Baja, crosskarts, and how his battle with bipolar disorder had a hand in his career.

http://www.justinpeck.com/

WATCH this show: https://youtu.be/NyAJdr2-ixc

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @justinpeck49

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @justinpeck49

 

New Shirts: https://www.blipshift/com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
